name: Riders by Lee Women's Plus-Size Classic Casual Pants
categoryPath: Clothing/Women's Plus/Women's Plus Bottoms/Women's Plus Pants

reviews.name: Riders by Lee Women's Plus-Size Classic Casual Pants
reviews.reviewText: I have bought these pants from Walmart in the past & they were great, but this product has changed. It is made with cheaper material & the stitching is like a pair of jeans. These pants used to be like a pair of khaki's that was appropriate for work, this last round that I bought seem like jeans. It is called "easy care " I would consider that wash dry & wear, but even though I haven't washed them the material seems as though it would require ironing when taken out of the wash. I think they'll be going back , very disappointed !
reviews.title: This product has changed

reviews.name: Riders by Lee Women's Plus-Size Classic Casual Pants
reviews.reviewText: I needed khaki pants for work. I had a hard time finding them. I found a lot of khaki capris,but not the pants. When I did the the khaki pants were either chinos or tapered ankle. Neither could be worn to work. So, I found these riders khaki pants on line not in the store. The fabrics is light and the length is great for me at 5'9 . All the pockets are active useable pockets in the front and the back. Nice work pant for the price.
reviews.title: Nice for work pants during the summer.

reviews.name: Riders by Lee Women's Plus-Size Classic Casual Pants
reviews.reviewText: These are my favorite pants and I can rearely find them in the stores, so I have to order online. I just hope you dont stop carrying them, I wear them everyday for work, they are comfortable and hold up nicely.
reviews.title: Great Fit

reviews.name: Riders by Lee Women's Plus-Size Classic Casual Pants
reviews.reviewText: Love the comfort of the pants and true to fit.
reviews.title: Riders by Lee relaxed fit

reviews.name: Riders by Lee Women's Plus-Size Classic Casual Pants
reviews.reviewText: I'm a very hippy lady with large thighs. Hard to find pants without a huge waist or too short. These are great. Bought another pair for a spare.
reviews.title: Hippy
